Name: Preserve console logs
Description: Can I preserve console logs across page reloads?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Notes:
1. Open console using `Cmd+Opt+J` or `Ctrl+Shift+J` > Click on the gear icon in top right to open "Console settings".
2. Check "Preserve log" to preserve log statements between page reloads.
Chrome.Name: Preserve console logs

Firefox.Notes: 1. Open **Console Settings** from the toolbar in top right > Click "Persist Logs" to preserve the console output each time you visit a new page.
Firefox.Name: Preserve console logs

Edge.Notes:
1. Open console using `Cmd+Opt+J` or `Ctrl+Shift+J` > Click on the gear icon in top right to open "Console settings".
2. Check "Preserve log" to preserve log statements between page reloads.
Edge.Name: Preserve console logs

Safari.Name: Preserve console logs
Safari.Notes: 1. In the **Console** tab, select the "Preserve Log" checkbox in the toolbar (top) to persist logs across page reloads.

Opera.Notes:
1. Open console using `Cmd+Opt+J` or `Ctrl+Shift+J` > Click on the gear icon in top right to open "Console settings".
2. Check "Preserve log" to preserve log statements between page reloads.
Opera.Name: Preserve console logs
